Text: Fw Kidsavefriends Calling Russia and KazShelley Here is another idea for communicating when you are able to call Suzanne Original Message From To Sent Saturday August PM Subject Re Kidsavefriends Calling Russia and Kaz We use ATT global plan With this plan came information for a translator service For a few dollars per minute ATT will put a live person on the line to translate for you When Patty And Kairat were in Moscow and I was home I used this service to find out from the desk clerk that Patty had given me the wrong room number therefore causing a big lack of communication Worth Every Penny sincerely Art Francis Kairats Father Yahoo Groups Sponsor FREE COLLEGE MONEY CLICK HERE to search scholarships zoUwDmCAAySSFAAHCOolBTM To be removed from the list send a blank email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

Fw Kidsavefriends Iskorka phone numberShelley I do not know if this is her orphanage or not but thought that I would pass this onto you Suzanne Original Message From To Sent Saturday August AM Subject Re Kidsavefriends Iskorka phone number hi diane i am not sure in karagunda which orphange my soon to be adopted daughter lives but i do have the number and i spoke to her last night no one therespoke english but yoiu can try so good luck to you you have a chance on this being your orphange what do you have to lose have a great day athena argiris Yahoo Groups Sponsor Learn Trading Tips the Professional Traders Use Free Newsletter from Optioneticscom qufhBZRCAAySSFAAHCOolBTM To be removed from the list send a blank email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

Fw Kidsavefriends Re Took the PlungeShelley Below is some info on another Kaz site to get info on the process orphanages etc from adoptive parents Suzanne Original Message From To Sent Thursday August AM Subject Kidsavefriends Re Took the Plunge Are there people on this list who have already adopted from Kazakahstan If so wed love to pick your brain a little about your experience Congratulations We also adopted a Kidsave child who was hosted by someone else and he and is sister are the joys of our lives We were able to talk with so many people who personally met Nicholas during his stay that when we arrived in Kazakhstan to meet him we felt as if we had known him our whole lives And YES there are MANY of us on this list who have adopted from Kazkahstanand MANY MORE on the PAKK list which was started in by the first give Kidsave Kaz families The list has more than Kaz families and is on yahoogroupscom The PAKK MESSAGE archive as well as the BOOKMARKS and LINKS section are terrific sources of information on adopting from Kazakhstan and on Kazakhstan in general Laura Yahoo Groups Sponsor Get your FREE credit report with a FREE CreditCheck Monitoring Service trial MmxkDbQCAAySSFAAHCOolBTM To be removed from the list send a blank email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

Fw Kidsavefriends Took The PlungeShelley Below is the post and the coordinators email address Good luck Suzanne Original Message From Ellen To Sent Friday August AM Subject Kidsavefriends Took The Plunge When did your little girl Anastasia leave Was it today If soI met her today at JFK I greeted the group from Austin today and got them on the plane to Moscow this evening Let me know I have some photos of her and Ill send them privately to you Ellen Hillman Coordinator Kidsave International Summer Miracles Northern NJ Lower NY LI wwwkidsaveorg Mark Wade wrote the following Teena and I committed yesterday to adopting Anastasia the yr old from Kazakahstan who was hosted in Texas Were so excited and just had to share the news with every one Are there people on this list who have already adopted from Kazakahstan If so wed love to pick your brain a little about your experience Yahoo Groups Sponsor FREE COLLEGE MONEY CLICK HERE to search scholarships zoUwDmCAAySSFAAHCOolBTM To be removed from the list send a blank email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

Re Kidsavefriends Re Took the PlungeShelly The guardianship is not a Texas requirement that I am aware of so if Across the World does not need it then lets not worry about it Please do use AtW forms just make me a copy Let me look back at the requirements for the letter regarding Chad I am going to forward on a post from a coordinator who saw the Austin kids at JFK She has pictures of one of the Austin kids so she may have a picture of your daughter She can probably tell you how she was doing at that point Just email her and ask her Suzanne Original Message From Corman Shelley To tina whiteman Sent Friday August PM Subject RE Kidsavefriends Re Took the Plunge Suzanne I received the Across the World adoption package Most of the info that you asked for our your homestudy document checklist is also required for the dossier I am assuming that if I use the Across the World employment letters income verification and medical screening forms that these will be okay for you too The dossier does not ask for a letter from Chads dr so I dont have a form for this one Is it sufficient to have a letter on the Drs letterhead that states that he is in good health and free of communicable disease Also the dossier does not ask for a guardianship form Is that a Tx requirement Do you have a sample Original Message From tina whiteman mailto Sent Thursday August PM To Corman Shelley Subject Fw Kidsavefriends Re Took the Plunge Shelly Below is from one of the egroups that I belong too Maybe you can get the address info from one of the places listed below Suzanne Original GuardianshipShelley For the guardianshipcan you pick someone but not have it notarized It does not have to be an agreement that is signed between the two of you ignore what I wrote on the list I gave you It is just to make clear that you guys have thought about this and have a plan just in case You can officially do something later For now ie we plan to use either or if something happens Also be sure and request a packet from Ginger The other family Gras that I am working with has this There are forms for the medical etc Apparently Ginger wants two things There needs to be a Texas approved homestudy and then a shorten version that is under pages to send to Kaz Ms Gras was telling me this over the phone today and is going to send me the requirements Hope you were not too tired today Suzanne
